Jx.Notifier

Extends: Jx.ListView

Summary
Jx.NotifierExtends: Jx.ListView
Options
parentThe parent this notifier is to be placed in.
templateThis is the template for the notification container itself, not the actual notice.
listOptionsAn object holding custom options for the internal Jx.List instance.
Functions
addAdd a new notice to the notifier
removeAdd a new notice to the notifier

Options

parent

The parent this notifier is to be placed in.  If not specified, it will be placed in the body of the document.

template

This is the template for the notification container itself, not the actual notice.  The actual notice is below in the class property noticeTemplate.

listOptions

An object holding custom options for the internal Jx.List instance.

Functions

add

add: function (notice)

Add a new notice to the notifier

Parameters

notice{Jx.Notice} the notice to add

remove

remove: function (notice)

Add a new notice to the notifier

Parameters

notice{Jx.Notice} the notice to remove
